questions.question: How many China-based mid-sized Amazon.de sellers in consumer electronics fit our ICP size band (10-100 staff, 500-5,000 SKUs)?
questions.why_it_matters: Sets realistic TAM/SAM and sales target volume for the first wedge.

questions.question: Who signs the budget first in this wedge: operations, compliance/legal, or marketplace team?
questions.why_it_matters: Determines outbound motion and sales messaging.

questions.question: What is the measurable cost of missing-document delays (days lost, revenue impact, rework) for target accounts?
questions.why_it_matters: Defines ROI proof needed for pilot conversion.

questions.question: Which partner channel converts fastest for this wedge: Amazon agencies, VAT/EPR consultancies, or direct seller outbound?
questions.why_it_matters: Sets efficient route to first 10 paid customers.

questions.question: What should Germany electronics rulepack v1 include to maximize signal and minimize false positives?
questions.why_it_matters: Controls trust, adoption, and engineering scope.
